name: Little Red Memories
description:
Bonnie, a young woman struggling with traumatic memories of her past, begins to find herself in a strange, dangerous world that's set out to kill her no matter what. Will she be able to permanently escape this unfamiliar world, and escape the horrors from her memories along the way? Or will she succumb to the darkness of The Parallel and meet her end? 

Little Red Memories Is my first-ever Rpg horror game! It includes:

♡ ~2-3 hours of gameplay

♡ 20+ different cgs

♡ 3 different endings to get

♡ Countless puzzles in a spooky atmosphere

♡ A game with similar vibes to classic horror Rpg games we all know and love!

Content Warning: Little Red Memories may contain triggering topics. 

♡ If you are sensitive to subjects such as death, murder, stalking, mentions of suicide, or child abuse please play with caution.

Controls:

♡ Arrow keys to move

♡ Z or Enter to confirm

♡ X to cancel or open the menu

♡ Hold Shift to run
